title: Changing Dynamic Queue / Champion Select Music
body:
Is there a way to change the Dynamic Queue Champion Select music? There seems to be layers of mp3 files so it's not that hard to do i... If anyone has cracked it, please reply and share! :D 

{{champion:136}}  www.twitch.tv/AstroZG drop a follow ^-^

replies.body:
There may be a way, but we don't support it since you'd have to modify the game files to do so. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
